coza.opencollab.synthesis.push.service

Interface DeviceService


  • public interface DeviceService
    Interface for managing Device instances.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Long countDevices()
      Counts the number of all registered devices.
      Long countDevices(String platform)
      Counts the number of devices by device type.
      List<Device> findAllDevices()
      Find all devices that are registered.
      Device findDeviceById(Long id)
      Finds a Device by the Object ID for the Device.
      Device findDeviceByRegistrationId(String regid)
      Finds a device by the registrations id.
      Device findDeviceByUUID(String uuid)
      Finds device with the specified device id.
      List<Device> findDevicesByPlatform(String platform)
      Finds all devices of a specific type.
      List<Device> findDevicesByUsername(String username)
      Returns a list of devices registed by a username.
      boolean removeAllDevices()
      Removes the all devices.
      void removeDevice(Long id)
      Removes a Device instance from persistence.
      Device saveDevice(Device device)
      Persists a Device instance.

      • saveDevice

        Persists a Device instance.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the device

        Removes a Device instance from persistence.
        Parameters:
        id - the id

      • removeAllDevices

        boolean removeAllDevices()
        Removes the all devices.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • countDevices

        Long countDevices()
        Counts the number of all registered devices. This can included devices that does not have a Registration ID and Username.
        Returns:
        the long

      • countDevices

        Long countDevices(String platform)
        Counts the number of devices by device type. This can included devices that does not have a Registration ID and Username.
        Parameters:
        platform - the platform
        Returns:
        the long

      • findDevicesByPlatform

        List<Device> findDevicesByPlatform(String platform)
        Finds all devices of a specific type. This can included devices that does not have a Registration ID and Username
        Parameters:
        platform - the platform
        Returns:
        the list

      • findAllDevices

        List<Device> findAllDevices()
        Find all devices that are registered. This can included devices that does not have a Registration ID and Username
        Returns:
        the list

      • findDevicesByUsername

        List<Device> findDevicesByUsername(String username)
        Returns a list of devices registed by a username.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        Returns:
        the list

      • findDeviceByUUID

        Device findDeviceByUUID(String uuid)
        Finds device with the specified device id. In theory, this should only return on Device
        Parameters:
        uuid - the uuid
        Returns:
        the device

      • findDeviceByRegistrationId

        Device findDeviceByRegistrationId(String regid)
        Finds a device by the registrations id.
        Parameters:
        regid - Registration id of the device
        Returns:
        The device for that registration ID

      • findDeviceById

        Device findDeviceById(Long id)
        Finds a Device by the Object ID for the Device.
        Parameters:
        id - If of the Device to find.
        Returns:
        the device
